shots.prompt:
Subject: ancient ritual circle projected as hologram
Action: symbols slowly rotate and pulse
Style: occult cyberpunk, ethereal blue light
Camera: overhead view, sacred geometry emphasized
Ambience: darkened room, technology and mysticism merged
Audio: electronic chanting, data streams

Subject: ghostly figure materializes in digital static
Action: form solidifies from glitched pixels
Style: haunting beauty, digital corruption aesthetic
Camera: medium shot, figure emerging from noise
Ambience: reality glitching, spectral presence
Audio: digital whispers, phantom voices
